settings.delete_user_account.account_del.string: Account deletion is in progress and may take a few moments. You will be redirected once deletion is complete.

settings.delete_user_account.are_you_sur.string: Are you sure you want to delete your Figma account?

settings.delete_user_account.deleting_yo.string: Deleting your {email} account will delete all your associated data such as your files, components and images, including content you have shared with others. You cannot undo this operation.

settings.any_resources_you_have_marked_f.string: As per our {creatorAgreement}, any resources you have for sale will be placed into a delisted state. Past consumers will continue to have access to their purchased resources.

settings.delete_user_account.for_more_in.string: For more information about how we treat your data, please see our {privacyPolicyLink}.

settings.delete_user_account.you_must_ve.string: You must verify your email address before you can attempt this operation.

auth.two-factor-setup.remove-app-with-sm.string: You're about to turn off app-based two-factor, but SMS-based two-factor will still be on.

auth.two-factor-setup.this_will_disable_.string: This will disable two-factor authentication entirely.

auth.two-factor-setup.phone-number-setup.string: Your phone number is set to {phoneNumber}. Authentication codes will be texted to this number for logging in.

auth.two-factor-setup.sms-sent-message.string: SMS sent to {phoneNumber}. Please allow up to a minute for the SMS to arrive, then enter the authentication code below.

auth.two-factor-setup.enter-phone-number.string: Enter a phone number where we can send an authentication code via SMS.

auth.two-factor-setup.phone-number-opt-i.string: By providing your phone number, you agree to receive text messages from Figma to enable two-factor authentication when you log in. Message and data rates may apply.

auth.two-factor-setup.remove-number-with.string: You're about to remove your phone number, but app-based two-factor will still be on.

auth.two-factor-setup.authenticator-app-.string: You will need an authenticator mobile app to complete this process, such as one of the following:

auth.two-factor-setup.scan_the_qr_code_i.string: Scan the QR code into your app.

auth.two-factor-setup.click_here_to_manu.string: Click here to manually type the code instead.
